visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2' with the provided data. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include a white background and a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart has styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents the months of the year, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The chart includes two data series named 'Series 1' and 'Series 2', each with a distinct color. The background of the chart is set to white, and the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered and horizontally aligned. This configuration ensures a clean and readable visualization of the monthly average temperature data.
